text: Patriarch Metrophanes may refer to: *Patriarch Metrophanes II of Constantinople, reigned from 1440 to 1443 *Patriarch Metrophanes III of Constantinople, reigned from 1565 to 1572 and from 1579 to 1580 *Patriarch Metrophanes of Alexandria (Mêtrophanês Kritopoulos), reigned between 1636 and 1639
title: Patriarch Metrophanes
